posts.post_content: Selling  PSA 5  T206 Polar Bear  Hal Chase Portrait--Blue $1125 Delivered--check scans--Paypal or Check--Let me know if I am missing something, but a PSA 5 PB Chase Blue just sold in REA 12/3/23 for $2220--thanks, Don
